Text.Page:
Things aren't stable at the Eldritch Academy yet. Therefore, you are to kill some {@LinkCreature:22#10#senior apprentices} and collect their ribbons as proof of death.

Report to Feyth when your mission is complete.

It is what it is. Had to be done.

At least you had the skills.
If you can't take down a few senior apprentices, why should I give you anything?
